references.paper_title: Differentiable MPC for End-to-End Planning and Control
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of differentiable trajectory optimization, which is central to the DiffTORI method.
This paper introduces implicit behavioral cloning, a technique used in DiffTORI for imitation learning.

references.paper_title: Diffusion Policy: Visuomotor Policy Learning via Action Diffusion
references.reason: This paper proposes a diffusion-based policy representation, which is compared against the DiffTORI method in the paper.

references.paper_title: Pontryagin Differentiable Programming: An End-to-End Learning and Control Framework
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for differentiable trajectory optimization, which is relevant to the DiffTORI method.

references.paper_title: Temporal Difference Learning for Model Predictive Control
references.reason: This paper introduces the TD-MPC algorithm, which DiffTORI builds upon and improves.
